events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product and money back.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Maria to assist with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the jacket so we can process your refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is too tight in the shoulders, so I would prefer to get a refund instead of exchanging it.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the return label to your email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I look forward to receiving the return label so I can send the jacket back.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please return the jacket within 14 days for a full refund. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to check if you have returned the jacket and whether you need any help with the refund process.
I have already sent the jacket back yesterday via the return label. Please confirm when you receive it.
We have received your returned jacket and processed a full refund to your original payment method. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
I completed the survey and am satisfied with how the refund process was handled. Thank you for the excellent support.
Your refund case has been closed. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
